overview: It's summer again. The sky is bright, the sun is blazing and the Bel Ami boys are ready, willing and more than able to do what they do best. Hot and uninhibited, playful and romantic, just the way you want it. Shot on location in Central Europe, Frisky Summer 3 introduces amazingly beautiful new models romping with many of your favorites. It is the last and the best of the Frisky Summer trilogy.
title: Frisky Summer 3: Wild Strawberries
